Uses of Class
net.cloud.client.file.request.FileRequest

  • Packages that use FileRequest 
    Package Description
    net.cloud.client.file  
    net.cloud.client.file.request  

    • Uses of FileRequest in net.cloud.client.file

      Fields in net.cloud.client.file with type parameters of type FileRequest 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FileRequest<?>> FileServerThread.requestQueue
      We'll use a blocking queue to handle request storage for us
      Methods in net.cloud.client.file with parameters of type FileRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FileServerThread.submit(FileRequest<?> request)
      Submit a request to eventually be handled by the logic loop.
      void FileServer.submit(FileRequest<?> request)
      Submit a FileRequest to the server, so that it is eventually handled and assigned a file descriptor.
      <T> T FileServer.submitAndWaitForDescriptor(FileRequest<T> request)
      Slightly different that submitting a request and waiting for it, this convenience method will actually use the calling thread to fulfill the request rather than relying on the file server thread.

    • Uses of FileRequest in net.cloud.client.file.request

      Subclasses of FileRequest in net.cloud.client.file.request 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BufferedReaderRequest
      A request which asks for a BufferedReader to be created so that a file may be read from line by line.
      class  CachedFileRegionRequest
      A request which asks for a CachedFileRegion to be retrieved.
      class  CachedFileRequest
      A request which asks for a CachedFile to be retrieved.
      class  FileOutputStreamRequest
      A request which asks for a FileOutputStream to be created so that a file may have raw data written to it.
      class  LoadRequest<T>
      A FileRequest which in particular is requesting that a file be loaded and prepared for reading from.
      class  PrintWriterRequest
      A request which asks for a PrintWriter to be created so that a file may be written to line by line.
      class  RandomAccessFileLoadRequest
      Request that a read-only random access file be created and opened.
      class  SaveRequest<T>
      A FileRequest which in particular is requesting that a file be loaded and prepared for writing to.
      class  XmlLoadRequest<T>
      A request to deserialize from an XML file.
      class  XmlSaveRequest
